attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: yobs in hoodies should be made illegal because they couse nothing but trouble for the society of britain. they are nothing more than communal annoyances. in this petition, i know i will have the backing of atleast 3 friends who agree with me.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
